it.polimi.group03

Class Test

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.group03.Test

  • public class Test
extends java.lang.Object
    This class was implemented for specific testing purposes established in the requirements (for unit testing please see GameTest) and it should be used only for tests based on strings, some minor validations were done.

    This class is prepared to receive an input as follow:

    • [01] number of players +
    • [01] moving player +
    • [07] positions of the horizontal bars +
    • [07] positions of the vertical bars +
    • [49] beads in the grid +
    • [3*n] moves.
    Since:
    11/11/2015.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    cecibloom, megireci, tatibloom
